troubleshooting.title: Windows Service Reports Incorrect Function Error When Starting (TCP Server)

keywords.indexterm: Error: Incorrect Function Windows service error
Installing OxygenTCP floating license serverWindows 32-bitIncorrect Function error

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: My TCP floating license server reports an "Incorrect Function" error message when starting the Windows service.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This usually appears because the Windows service launcher cannot locate a Java virtual machine on your system.

steps-informal.p: Make sure that you have installed a 32-bit Java SE from Oracle (or Sun) on the system: .
